changeSet.createView:
select `mc`.`id` AS `id`, `mc`.`account_no` AS `account_no`, `mc`.`external_id` AS `external_id`, `mc`.`display_name` AS `display_name`, `mc`.`fullname` AS `fullname`, `mc`.`is_staff` AS `is_staff`, `mc`.`staff_id` AS `staff_id`, `mc`.`default_savings_account` AS `default_savings_account`, `mc`.`mobile_no` AS `mobile_no`, `mc`.`email_address` AS `email_address`, `mc`.`legal_form_enum` AS `legal_form_enum`, `slk`.`bvn` AS `bvn`,
`slk`.`nin` AS `nin`, `mc`.`firstname` AS `firstname`, `mc`.`lastname` AS `lastname`, `mc`.`date_of_birth` AS `date_of_birth`, `mckc`.`has_identification` AS `has_identification`,
`mc`.`client_type_cv_id` AS `client_type_cv_id`, `mc`.`client_classification_cv_id` AS `client_classification_cv_id`, `mc`.`submittedon_date` AS `submittedon_date`, `mc`.`created_by` AS `created_by`, `mc`.`status_enum` AS `status_enum`, `mc`.`office_id` AS `office_id`, `mc`.`transfer_to_office_id` AS `transfer_to_office_id` from (`m_client` `mc` left join `secondLevelKYC` `slk` on((`slk`.`client_id` = `mc`.`id`)) left join `m_client_kyc_checkers` `mckc` on((`mckc`.`client_id` = `mc`.`id`)) ) order by `mc`.`id` desc
